title: SEVENTH blocker confirmation - This is a PM routing bug, not an implementation ticket
issue: TKT-064 continues to fail SOP section 1.2 Pre-Flight Validation. This ticket has been blocked 6 times already with the same issue. The ticket was generated from finding F-022 where the human decision was 'explain this to me' - a request for explanation, NOT implementation. The ticket contains: (1) Empty files list, (2) 'Custom response' as the only fix requirement, (3) Non-testable acceptance criteria. This is a PM ROUTING BUG - explanation-only tickets should not be routed to dev agents. The human has already received their explanation via the decision system.

options.label: Mark ticket as INVALID and close — The human requested an explanation (which was provided), not implementation. Finding F-022 can remain in findings for future prioritization if the human later decides to implement server-side URL filtering.

Convert to proper implementation ticket — If the human NOW wants implementation (not just explanation), generate a NEW ticket with proper specs: files to modify (dashboard query/API code), server-side filtering approach, testable acceptance criteria. This would require PM investigation and codebase research.
Continue blocking — Keep this ticket blocked waiting for PM to fix the routing bug and either close the ticket or convert it to a proper implementation spec.

recommendation: Option 1 because after 7 blockers and multiple commits confirming the same issue, it's clear this ticket should never have been routed to a dev agent. The human got their explanation through the decision system. If implementation is desired later, that requires a NEW ticket with proper research and specifications.

progress.notes_for_next_agent: STOP RETRYING THIS TICKET. After 7 blocker reports, the problem is clear: the PM system is routing explanation-only tickets to dev agents. This is a PM bug, not a ticket that needs continuation. The human wanted an explanation (which they got), not implementation. If you are the 8th agent seeing this ticket, IMMEDIATELY escalate to human oversight - the PM retry loop is broken.
